problem_text: Let V be a vector space of dimension n over a field. A subgroup G of GL_n(V) is said to be rich in transvections if n ⩾ 2 and for every hyperplane H ⊆ V and every line L ⊆ H there is at least one transvection in G with residual line L and fixed space H. Describe the automorphisms of the subgroups of GL_2(V) which are rich in transvections. Yu. I. Merzlyakov
